title: Hakuba → Tokyo - Disneyland
content:
We had a very full day today! Had to travel all the way back to Tokyo from Hakuba in the morning, drop our luggage at our hotel, then get over to Disneyland as quickly as we could! All the while snow is starting to fall in Tokyo, meaning public transport was inevitably going to experience problems.

We made it to Disneyland fine, the real surprise was how much more interesting it was (or any theme park for that matter) in the snow! Going on rides with gaps in the roof had snow falling on us; stepping out of a ride to see the park more white than before; having few crowds because of it not being a weekend and the snow - it was all great! By the end of the night we’d gone on 12 rides including a stack we hadn’t planned to, and we had a heap of fun just hanging out in a theme park in the snow. 

The rides in order were: 

Pirates of the Caribbean
Big Thunder Mountain
Splash Mountain
Haunted Mansion
It’s a Small World
Alice’s Tea Party
Pooh’s Hunny Hunt
Roger Rabbit’s Car Toon Spin
Buzz Lightyear’s Astro Blasters
Space Mountain
Star Tours: The Adventure Continues
Monsters, Inc. Ride & Go Seek

There are more photos in part 2!
